By increasing funding for essential programs like @IHSgov, @BureauIndianEdu, & the Bureau of Indian Affairs, we are honoring our federal trust & treaty responsibilities to provide for the health, safety, and education of our Native American brothers & sisters.

💧 strengthen water infrastructure, 
💧 remove toxic contamination, 
💧 and ensure clean drinking water for all

.@HouseDemocrats have crafted an Interior-Environment Appropriations bill that rejects Pres. Trump’s damaging cuts. We support evidence-based science and make important investments in the health of our communities and our environment.

For Minnesotans, this bill takes significant steps to protect our natural resources, including report language that protects the #BWCA from potential mining pollution, increases funding to tackle invasive species, & provides research dollars to combat Chronic Wasting Disease

This bill boosts funding for #ClimateChange research, provides $9.5 billion for clean air and water programs, rejects Trump administration proposed cuts to the arts and humanities, and invests more than $10 billion to support and strengthen Indian tribal self-determination
As Chair of the Interior-Environment Appropriations Subcommittee, I’m proud to put forth a bill that takes vital steps to protect the environment, our public lands, & public health.
